website_summaries.verdict: Performs well on solid surfaces and meets expectations of longtime customers.
pros: Customers highlight the tire's ability to adapt to 7-inch wheels, and does not require tubing
Easy to install and works as expected by those performing the work

customer_reviews.title: Tractor Tires
customer_reviews.text: Grandpa loves them. Grandma loves that Papa is outside again.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Crouse

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, sturdy tire. Sidewalls are very stiff, and big deep lugs... They will be a great hard working tire. Im very impressed for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Papawheelie81

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  tire - good price
customer_reviews.text: I like that these tires are American made. The quality if exceptional and I expect to receive another 10 plus years out of them as I did with the last pair.
customer_reviews.author: G H

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire !!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried when I saw the price which is $200 less than in my local store. I was pleasantly surprised when it arrived quickly and it was perfect for our needs. I will be buying another one after the holidays. I would definitely recommend to anyone in need of a tractor tire.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L.

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: Great tires just don't allow someone to over charge you..ry Amazon first.
customer_reviews.author: bassman

customer_reviews.title: They are to soft!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price and the looks of the tires and the speedy delivery ‘! But I do not like the quality of the tires the first day I put them on i had 4 flats on them. I do a lot of brush hogging and my last tires i only had 2 flats on them in little over 3 years!
customer_reviews.author: John Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the money and prompt delivery also. It fits my old 1979 Kubota properly. I highly recommend this tire and company !! Two thumbs up !!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Moffett

customer_reviews.title: great tire
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tires. I used these for a compact demo derby car. No lack of traction issues. These tires were as advertised and I will buy another set soon.
customer_reviews.author: steelman

customer_reviews.title: not what picture shows in size
customer_reviews.text: Wrong size and depiction on pictures not what they say they are they only picked up 1 tire not 2 smh
customer_reviews.author: Harry Lee Bolyard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price. Can't find them in stock around here.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to great tires. I put one on but kept one in reserve. I always to get a flat at the worst time.
customer_reviews.author: Lunch pail in maine

customer_reviews.title: New front tires
customer_reviews.text: Very strong tire....deep tread! I put them on my 4 wheel drive farm tractor. $ very well spent
customer_reviews.author: Robin Crown

customer_reviews.title: Sick nasty looking tires
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and the tires are really good. It was worth the spend. Ill be using them for the derby
customer_reviews.author: Jabin McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: This is a bargain and a good tire. Half the cost of a local tire shop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less than junk
customer_reviews.text: These tires are absolute junk, they didn’t last a week before they started to separate. Spend a few more dollars now on a better tire and save yourself the headache and aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Young

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY PRODUCT DELIVERED TIMELY
customer_reviews.text: QUALITY IS GOOD AND HAD THE SIZE I NEEDED. HASSLE FREE
customer_reviews.author: CRAIG HEINZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As advertised-- no problems with it mounted on the tractor
customer_reviews.author: DWM

customer_reviews.title: Great tread, well made.
customer_reviews.text: The tires appear to be well made. Perfect tread pattern and depth.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: This product is very, good, I like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Brock

customer_reviews.title: Look nice. The tires I took off were 41 years ...
customer_reviews.text: Came within 3 days. Look nice . The tires I took off were 41 years old. If these don't last as long I will deducting a few stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Aggressive Tractor Tire - Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great tires with aggressive, deep lugs. Install was quick and painless. Will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tire was perfect replacement on my lk3054 Kioti tractor. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell Wilson

customer_reviews.title: They were just perfect on the application that I was using them for
customer_reviews.text: They were just perfect on the application that I was using them for. Also got them in very record time.
customer_reviews.author: Jay G.

customer_reviews.title: and are perfect OEM
customer_reviews.text: Tires arrived on time, fit perfectly, and are perfect OEM replacements
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tires for my farm truck it’s only 2wd and now I can go anywhere my 4x4 does I have a welded diff but no lack of traction I’ll be buying some for the front next
customer_reviews.author: dan seel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good tires, direct replacement for my New Holland tractor 4x4. Fast shipping nice transaction. AAAA+++++
customer_reviews.author: steven stratton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The tire is really good. I am very happy and satisfied with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: ALBERT L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Got product earlier than expected and was exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Tommy C.

feature_bullets: General all purpose tractor tire for multiple soil conditions
